title: “If You Leave” by Paul & Storm & Scalzi: Out Now!
summary: Once upon a time I said to the famous musical combo Paul and Storm, “Hey, did you know that ‘If You Leave,’ the classic 80s synthpop hit by the musical band Orchestral Maneuvers in the Dark, could be sung almost exactly like a tune from that famous 50s musical personality, Elvis Presley. ” And they said, […]

title: This is what software development looks like now
Where Do You Find Comfort?
summary: I am a creature of habit.  I like to get up at the same time every day, go to bed at the same time, eat my meals at the same time.  I'm not at Rainman level when it comes to things...

title: The Hacking of Culture and the Creation of Socio-Technical Debt
summary: Culture is increasingly mediated through algorithms.  These algorithms have splintered the organization of culture, a result of states and tech companies vying for influence over mass audiences.  One byproduct of this splintering is a shift from imperfect but broad cultural narratives to a proliferation of niche groups, who are defined by ideology or aesthetics instead of nationality or geography...

summary: Discover the joy of coding for results rather than mastery, as one programmer shares their unique perspective on why they code
